p: The proposed process was designed for the recovery of all components between C2 and C6 fatty acids, and it required $0.53/kg fatty acids as utility cost of separation and purification. The utility cost of separation and purification accounts 60% [ 27] to 80% [ 6] of whole production cost of acids. Considering mixed acid price of $2.70/kg [ 54] and solvent loss equivalent to 3% of product amount, the utility cost is low enough to apply the proposed scheme to up-scaling processes.
